text.__SUMMARY__:
Anemone rivularis is an upright growing, clump forming herbaceous plant species in the genus Anemone and family Ranunculaceae. It is found in East Asia including Himalayas, Sri Lanka and Tibet. It is found in meadows and paddy fields on the elevation of 4,000–5,000 metres (13,000–16,000 ft).
